SELECT mtl_od_code , mtl_od_quantity , mtl_od_date , dilivery_date , price , mt_code , cp_code , user_id , mtl_od_status
FROM mtl_od WHERE mtl_od_status = '입고품질검사대기'

SELECT i.ins_date , i.ins_code , i.ins_status , o.cp_code , m.mt_name , m.specification , i.number_of_tests , i.number_of_passes , i.total_pass , o.mtl_od_code , o.mt_code , i.user_id
FROM mtl_od o JOIN inspection i ON o.mtl_od_code = i.mtl_od_code JOIN mt m ON o.mt_code = m.mt_code WHERE i.ins_status = '검사완료' and o.MTL_OD_STATUS not in ('반품', '입고품질검사완료')

SELECT i.ins_code ins_code , i.ins_status , i.ins_type_code , o.mtl_od_code , o.mtl_od_quantity , o.mtl_od_date , o.dilivery_date , o.price , o.mt_code , o.cp_code , m.mt_name FROM mtl_od o JOIN inspection i ON o.mtl_od_code = i.mtl_od_code JOIN mt m ON o.mt_code = m.mt_code WHERE o.mtl_od_code = #{mtlOdCode}

SELECT i.ins_item_name ins_item_name ,i.ins_item_citeria ins_item_citeria , d.ins_value , d.ins_result FROM ins_detail d JOIN ins_item i ON d.ins_item_code = i.ins_item_code WHERE i.ins_type_code = (SELECT material_type_code FROM mt WHERE mt_code = ( SELECT MATERIAL_TYPE FROM mt WHERE mt_code = ( SELECT mt_code FROM mtl_od WHERE mtl_od_code = #{mtlOdCode} ) )
)
SELECT i.number_of_passes , i.user_id , i.ins_code , o.mtl_od_code , o.mt_code , o.cp_code FROM inspection i JOIN mtl_od o on i.mtl_od_code = o.mtl_od_code WHERE mtl_od_status = '입고품질검사완료'
